nbastatR
  • ASBC LLC
  • Reference

Installation

devtools::install_github("abresler/nbastatR")

nbastatR

A package to help you master the NBA data universe in R.

Wrappers

  • NBA Stats API
  • Basketball-Reference
  • HoopsHype
  • nbadraft.net
  • realgm
  • Basketball Insiders
